item.title: UGC Content Creator / Product Review Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Upwork,

I own a private label on Amazon and selling plant-based protein powders – pouches and sachets. I am looking to hire individuals who will make HIGH quality UGC videos for my products.

I will provide you with choices of recipes OR provide me with a recipe to be approved by our team. I will mail you the products. Please choose one of the following flavours - Peanut Butter, Chocolate Peanut Butter, Unflavoured, Chocolate, Matcha, Vanilla, Vanilla Chai, Banana Cinnamon.

EXPECTATIONS:
The UGC videos that I am looking for require a combination of authenticity, storytelling, and audience engagement. It is important that you are energetic, and you create compelling content that resonates with the audience and fosters a vibrant community of creators.

Each video must be 2 minutes minimum to 3 minutes maximum. The size for you to record is Landscape and size 16:9. I will be using it for Amazon and YouTube.

EXAMPLES OF WHAT IS BEING REQUESTED:
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XuRJ5j_GJY
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CVPx2gq5Hz8   
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMqgJRdPbAk
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sChOm1ROlQ
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngrP5GqXhHE
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-nljYtc4qyk
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BXkMse3t664
• https://www.youtube.com/shorts/lXlBvVo54yA
• https://www.youtube.com/shorts/BceRjU4Vi2A
• https://www.youtube.com/shorts/d3XvTQgtrIk
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eCweOkynbRg
• https://www.youtube.com/shorts/HW4H7MBfbLY
• https://www.youtube.com/shorts/DP2yuq45rKI
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idkxSOBiLh8
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Cd2Ax9FrYg
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fzKERpE8Lg

EDITS and PRESENTATION:
• Clear when speaking, good sound quality and video quality.
• Low tune of music, the focus should be your presentation.
• No swearing, I require professional video with lots of energy.
• I would like you to edit it (if possible). If you cannot edit it, tell me ahead of time.

TIME BUDGET:
1 hour to 1.50 hours


Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:43 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Food & Beverage, Reputation Management, Content Writing, Creative Writing, UGC, English, Product Review, Influencer Marketing
Skills: Food & Beverage, Reputation Management, Content Writing, Creative Writing, UGC, English, Product Review, Influencer Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor for Baseball Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced YouTube video editor to join our baseball channel. As the video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our baseball-related videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of baseball and a passion for creating engaging and visually appealing content.

This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as Bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!

Key responsibilities:
- Create engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly
- Edit and enhance baseball-related videos
- Add graphics, text, and effects to make the videos more engaging
- Ensure videos are of high quality and meet our brand standards
- Collaborate with the content team to brainstorm ideas for new videos
- Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing techniques and trends in the baseball niche

Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to, which will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

1. Baseball Doesn't Exist https://www.youtube.com/@BaseballDoesntExist/videos
2. All Sports Highlights https://www.youtube.com/@allsportshighlights6518
3. REBOUND Baseball https://www.youtube.com/@REBOUNDbaseball/videos

Requirements:
- English expert
- 48-hour or less turnaround time
- Willing to work long-term and grow with the team
- Proven experience as a video editor, specifically with YouTube content
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong knowledge of baseball and its related terminology
- Creative mindset with an eye for detail
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

If you are passionate about baseball and have a knack for creating compelling videos, we would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio or links to previous work in your application.

(5 videos for $200)

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Assistant / Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone with experience as a social media marketer / assistant / manager to help create social media content for my Digital Marketing Consultancy brand.

I am preparing to undertake some email outreach and paid advertising and wish to establish an online presence before I do so, and therefore want to have some content on my channels prior to undertaking any sales strategies.

I’m currently putting together a content plan to publish on my Instagram and Facebook profiles, with the view to extending this to YouTube and TikTok as well.

So, I’m looking for someone who has great skills in using design applications and platforms such as Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Capcut and Canva to create a batch of content.

Once you've created the content you'll be scheduling it for publication to these channels using your preferred social media management application / platform.

Some of the content will be video so you will ideally have good video editing skills, and will need to be able to work with multiple visual and audio assets such as video, image and graphic files, and voice over recordings.

You will need to have an understanding of the optimum pixel resolution and aspect ratio guidelines that are currently standard for posting content on Facebook and Instagram, such as 16:9, 9:16, 5:4 and 1x1, and which scenario each aspect ratio is relevant. E.g. 5:4 sized images are cropped to square format on the FB feed, but 5:4 sized videos aren’t.

When it comes to creating content, you don’t need to be a fully qualified graphic designer, but it would be great if you have somewhat of an ‘eye’ for design, and not just be someone who can simply use the Canva platform.

You’ll also be conceptualising new and fresh content ideas and using your understanding and knowledge of current trends to create engaging click worthy content.

The hours will be ad hoc to start with, but if the partnership works well there may be an opportunity to become my social media manager.


Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:43 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook, Instagram
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Voice Over Artist for Baseball Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are a baseball channel on YouTube looking for an experienced voice-over artist to join our team. As a voice-over artist, you will be responsible for narrating and providing voice-overs for our baseball-related videos. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of baseball and be able to deliver engaging and professional voiceovers that captivate our audience.

This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!

You will be responsible for narrating 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly

Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to, which will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

1. Baseball Doesn't Exist https://www.youtube.com/@BaseballDoesntExist/videos
2. All Sports Highlights https://www.youtube.com/@allsportshighlights6518
3. REBOUND Baseball https://www.youtube.com/@REBOUNDbaseball/videos

Requirements:
1. English expert
    - Excellent vocal delivery and pronunciation
    - Clear and pleasant speaking voice
    - Ability to match tone and style to different video content
2. Professional equipment
3. 36h or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long-term and grow with the team

This is a great opportunity for someone passionate about baseball and voice acting to work with a growing YouTube channel dedicated to the sport.

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
I look forward to receiving your work.

(4 voice-overs for $100)


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:39 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male, Audio Editing, US English Dialect
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male, Audio Editing, US English Dialect
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed for an educational resource series - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for a reliable and experienced editor who works on Adobe Premiere Pro to edit 55 short videos about Chinese characters as an educational resource.

Each video describes a Chinese character and is roughly 1-2 min long.

All assets and materials will be provided as well as a completed video to use as a template. It's not tricky editing, it's quite straightforward but it does require attention to detail and consistency.

We need these videos completed by the end of June/early July so please be aware of this tight turnaround time when applying.

We estimate each video will take half an hour to edit and the other half hour would be used for one revision and anything extra resulting in a total of one hour spent on one character/video,

In total we are estimating about 55 hours of work.

We value someone who has good communication skills and can deliver on time.

If this sounds like you then please get in touch!

Looking forward to hearing you :)


Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation
Skills: Digital Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation
Country: Australia
click to apply
